name: Continental Top Contact Winter II 700 x 37 Reflex Folding
categories: Top Contact Winter II 700 x 37 Reflex Folding
description: Studless tires for northern winters, they grip where other tires would leave you spinning your wheels. Hundreds of lamellae (tiny biting edges, like those found on gecko's feet) interlock with slick road surfaces.Good for all bikes and approved for e-bikes.Reflective sidewall acts as a reflector to keep you visible on short winter days.Tread compound adapted for cold temperatures.3-ply design with 180 threads per inch.
